original_title: Only Fools and Horses: Secrets & Scandals
overview: Behind-the-scenes stories of how Only Fools and Horses was made, and how the cast could have looked very different. The secrets behind the hilarious visual gags are revealed, and there's a look at the lost episodes of the show. Featuring interviews with Sue Holderness, who played Marlene, comedy actor and fan John Thomson, alongside cast and crew who made the series.
title: Only Fools and Horses: Secrets & Scandals
